elementSpec.desc: defines the location of a place as a set of geographical co-ordinates, in terms of a other named geo-political entities, or as an address

attDef.desc: defines how the content of the element should be interpreted in the case where it is given as text only

valItem.desc: a pair of numbers to be interpreted as latitude followed by longitude according to a specified datum, by default WGS84
the value supplied is to be interpreted according to local convention
the value supplies is descriptive text
